raw: * Abstract base class for GUI applications using qooxdoo widgets.
* @require(qx.core.Init)
* @use(qx.module.Animation)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Abstract base class for GUI applications using qooxdoo widgets.

raw: * @type {qx.ui.core.Widget} The root widget
* Create the root widget. This method is abstract and must be overridden
* by sub classes.
* @return {qx.ui.core.Widget} The root widget. This widget must be configured
*     with a {@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} or {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas} layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Create the root widget. This method is abstract and must be overridden by sub classes.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.ui.core.Widget} The root widget. This widget must be configured
     with a {@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} or {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas} layout.
@return.description:
The root widget. This widget must be configured
     with a {@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} or {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas} layout.

raw: * Returns the application's root widget. The root widgets can act as container
* for popups. It is configured with a {@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} (if the
* application is an inline application) layout or a {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas}
* (if the application is a standalone application) layout .
* The root has the same add method as the configured layout
* ({@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} or {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas}).
* @return {qx.ui.core.Widget} The application's root widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the application's root widget. The root widgets can act as container for popups. It is configured with a {@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} (if the application is an inline application) layout or a {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas} (if the application is a standalone application) layout . The root has the same add method as the configured layout ({@link qx.ui.layout.Basic} or {@link qx.ui.layout.Canvas}).

raw: interface method
interface method
* Updates the GUI rendering
interface method
interface method
* Translate a message
* Mark the message for translation.
* @param messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
* @param varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
* @return {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string

raw: * Translate a plural message
* Mark the messages for translation.
* Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.
* @param singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
* @param pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
* @param count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
* @param varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
* @return {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string

@return.name: @return
